akn:section.akn:heading: Standards and criteria applicable in a contested case brought by a third party and certain actions by the Commissioner.

akn:content.akn:p: A contested case brought by a third party based on a decision of the Commissioner pursuant to this subchapter shall be governed by applicable civil law; provided, that, the aggrieved party shall:

If the Commissioner decides to reverse, amend, or modify a certificate of authority issued to an SPFC or the order issued in connection with them for a reason other than that specified in ยง 31-3931.15, the Commissioner shall meet the standards and criteria provided in subsection (a) of this section.
